1.title: The Big Halloween Story
1.plot: When Bubbles Ice Bird and Female red bird went Trick or Treat until they saw something scary in Fat Pigs house and a Monster but it's just a pig.

1.title: Chuck Time
1.plot: When Chuck accidentally knocks Red off a precipice, the race is on to save him before he hits rock bottom.

2.title: Where's My Crown?
2.plot: When King Pig loses his crown, he finds out what it's like to be at the bottom of the pile for a change.

3.title: Full Metal Chuck
3.plot: Chuck puts the Blues through their paces on a military training course, but who will come out on top?

4.title: Another Birthday
4.plot: It's a special day for one of the Minion Pigs, but do the other Pigs know - or even care?

5.title: Egg Sounds
5.plot: The Birds are thrilled when the Eggs start to speak - but who are the hatchlings going to take after?

6.title: Pig Talent
6.plot: It's talent show time in Pig City, but with King Pig as judge the contestants have a lot to be nervous about.

7.title: Cordon Bleugh
7.plot: Will any of the Birds pluck up the courage to tell Matilda what they really think of her culinary skills?

8.title: True Blue?
8.plot: A disguised Minion Pig manages to infiltrate the Blues, but will the little Angry Birds fall for his ruse?

9.title: Do as I Say!
9.plot: Matilda tries to teach the Blues how to behave, but will she be as good as her word when the Pigs attack?

10.title: Off Duty
10.plot: While Red's away, the other Birds think it's their chance to play.

11.title: Slingshot 101
11.plot: Red teaches the Blues a lesson when he finds them messing around with the Slingshot, but he soon finds the boot on the other foot.

12.title: Thunder Chuck
12.plot: Chuck is on guard duty during a heavy storm, but doesn't want Red to find out that he's scared of lightning.

13.title: Gardening with Terence
13.plot: Terence casts an ominous shadow over Matilda's flower beds. Can she get him to move before her prize blooms wilt?

14.title: Dopeys on a Rope
14.plot: The Pigs plan a sneak attack from above - but the Blues soon take the bounce out of their bungee.

15.title: Trojan Egg
15.plot: King Pig launches a sneak attack on the eggs - will the Birds manage to see through his disguise?

16.title: Double Take
16.plot: The Blues disguise themselves as eggs for fun. The pigs kidnap the birds thinking they are the real eggs, and then other pigs go into the nest pretending to be eggs as well. Matilda is going to go bananas.

17.title: Crash Test Piggies
17.plot: Moustache Pig tries out his latest weapon of mass destruction on some very worried Minion Pigs.

18.title: Slappy-Go-Lucky
18.plot: Professor Pig's latest invention turns out to be far from relaxing when Moustache Pig gets his trotters on the plans.

19.title: Sneezy Does It
19.plot: When a nervous Minion Pig is chosen to carry the King's litter, can he stop himself sneezing long enough to carry out his duty?

20.title: Run Chuck Run
20.plot: The Birds are fed up with speedster Chuck winning every race, so they unleash their secret weapon: Terrence.

21.title: Hypno Pigs
21.plot: The Pigs resort to hypnosis to get the Eggs - but with Red out for the count, they can't resist a bit of fun.

22.title: Egg's Day Out
22.plot: A stray egg finds its way into Pig City - can Red discover where it's gone before Chef Pig makes it into an omelette?

23.title: Gatecrasher
23.plot: The Pigs finally capture the Eggs - but Chuck is determined to get through the gates of Pig City, even if it means using his head.

24.title: Hog Roast
24.plot: One thing's sure in Pig City - when you call the emergency services, the emergency is about to get a lot worse.

25.title: The Bird That Cried Pig
25.plot: Chuck is annoyed that Bomb always gets the credit for saving the eggs. So Chuck comes up with a plan to become the hero of the day, but unfortunately it goes terribly wrong.

26.title: Hamshank Redemption
26.plot: A prisoner pig tries to escape from his cell with all kinds of crazy attempts. Will he manage to free himself without going mad?

27.title: Green Pig Soup
27.plot: The pigs try to approach the eggs in Matilda's garden by disguising themselves as cabbages. But they didn't expect her to notice and then try to prune - or worse - cook them.

28.title: Catch of the Day
28.plot: Corporal Pig has gone egg-fishing. He attaches a plunger to a fishing line and sends it toward an island. He doesn't know that the Blues are also on the island, and they have lots of ideas what to put in the plunger instead of the eggs.

29.title: Nighty Night Terence
29.plot: During the night the pigs try to grab the nest that's resting on a big boulder. But they soon find out that the boulder is actually Terence, who's fast asleep. Will they manage to get the eggs without waking the huge bird up?

30.title: Piggy Wig
30.plot: While preparing for a royal dinner, King Pig tries on many wigs, but doesn't like any of them. While practicing on the slingshot, one of the Blues is struck by lighting and ends up passed out, landing on the King's head.

31.title: Pig Plot Potion
31.plot: Chef Pig turns Red into a pig thanks to an evil potion. And it works so well that Red himself starts bringing the eggs straight to King Pig. Will he realize what he's doing before it's too late?

32.title: Tooth Royal
32.plot: King Pig's tooth hurts so the minions do everything in their power (using silly devices) to take out this painful tooth.

33.title: Night of the Living Pork
33.plot: King Pig is attacked by zombies who want to eat his huge pile of candy. He's helpless until Bubbles comes trick or treating. Bubbles really can't bear the sight of zombies eating candy, so he must stop it right away. Let the fight begin.

34.title: King of the Castle
34.plot: Chef Pig and King Pig engage in a crazy sandcastle competition. Who will win?

35.title: Love Is in the Air
35.plot: A cabbage falls on King Pig's head. He falls in love with it. The minions find it very cute, but Corporal Pig is dismayed. Will he manage to make King Pig come back to his senses?

36.title: Fired Up
36.plot: It's windy and cold on the Cobalt Plateaus. Chuck wants to keep the eggs warm, but Matilda and Red are already on it. Frustrated, Chuck decides to warm up the weather. But his idea will lead to some unexpected results.

37.title: Clash of Corns
37.plot: Bomb wants to eat Matilda's only corn plant. Of course, she's not happy about this and will do everything she can to stop him. But does this include giving up her principles of peace?

38.title: A Pig's Best Friend
38.plot: The Minion Pigs offer a captured Blue Bird to King Pig as a pet. Against all odds, it's really fun for the Blue Bird and he ends up driving King Pig crazy.

39.title: Slumber Mill
39.plot: A road is built on the house of a poor little pig. It's annoying him because he can't sleep anymore. He risks losing his job - so what is he going to do?

40.title: Jingle Yells
40.plot: It's Christmas and King Pig is expecting eggs under the Christmas tree. To get close to the eggs, Corporal Pig disguises himself as Santa with the Minions as his reindeer. But will the Blues spot the trick in time?

41.title: El Porkador!
41.plot: In their tireless effort to snatch the eggs, the pigs have teamed up with a terrifying giant pig named El Porkador. How will the helpless birds defend themselves?

42.title: Hiccups
42.plot: The Blues have the hiccups. The other Birds try to make it stop, but it just gets worse.

43.title: The Butterfly Effect
43.plot: Matilda is admiring a butterfly. The Pigs have the idea to create a replica butterfly to distract Matilda from the nest.

44.title: Hambo
44.plot: Corporal Pig is training his troops for "Operation Eggs". Hambo, the toughest of all the Minions, battles his way through the training field and is sent out on the big mission. He returns as a hero but something didn't quite go to plan.

45.title: Bird Flu!
45.plot: The Birds are all sick with the flu. It's a great chance for the Pigs to grab the eggs -- if they can make it out without getting sick themselves.

46.title: Piggies from the Deep
46.plot: It's a red-hot day in Pig City and the Minions are cooling down a bit in the water. Moustache Pig is relaxing in the pool and enjoying a moment of peace - when all of a sudden two shark fins swim by.

47.title: Oh Gnome!
47.plot: Chuck wants to surprise Matilda with a little present. It's a garden gnome that Matilda finds terribly ugly. She tries her best to discreetly get rid of the present, but it seems harder than expected.

48.title: Shrub It In
48.plot: Bomb and the Blues are playing around in the garden. Matilda's rose shrub, the apple of her eye, accidentally gets wrecked during all the fun. Bomb desperately tries to retrieve the situation while the Blues keep Matilda occupied.

49.title: The Truce
49.plot: Chef Pig wants to make a truce with the Birds by offering them a delicious picnic. The Birds are suspicious but soon have a change of heart. However, Chef Pig's intentions might not be completely sincere after all.

50.title: Operation Opera
50.plot: The Pigs are trying to trick Matilda with a self-made opera singing Pavarotti Bird. Matilda's thrilled about the stranger's efforts to court her and starts singing along. But did the Pigs bite off more than they can chew?

51.title: Chucked Out
51.plot: Chuck's latest craze is to karate chop things in two. Hiiiiyah. But his practicing gets too close to the delicate eggs, and the Birds have to ban him from the flock.

52.title: Bomb's Awake
52.plot: The Blues are having a restless night. Bomb is sleepwalking and carrying the precious eggs over some dangerous spots around the nest area. The Blues try their best to clear Bomb's path without waking the explosive bird up.

1.title: Treasure Hunt
1.plot: X marks the spot. King Pig sends his best pigs to retrieve a buried treasure. Of course when pigs are involved, nothing is that simple.

2.title: Sweets of Doom
2.plot: No one gets between Bubbles and his candy. Not even King Pig. But there's something fishy about these sweets.

3.title: Party Ahoy
3.plot: A massive pig party is raging on a remote island, but King Pig has been left behind. Luckily, Foreman Pig is there to help. Well, maybe luck isn't the right word.

4.title: Hide and Seek
4.plot: Little known fact, Chuck is a hide-and-seek champion. However, sometimes his hiding spots can be a bit too good.

5.title: Sink or Swim
5.plot: It's about time for Red to learn how to swim, but he's too stubborn to accept help from his friends. Can he overcome his pride and channel his inner waterfowl?

6.title: Super Bomb
6.plot: Bomb to the rescue. Bomb's love for classic superheroes inspires a new wardrobe choice, and a need to save everything on Piggy Island. But every superhero has a weakness.

7.title: Just So
7.plot: All Red wants is for the eggs to have a perfect environment where they can incubate in peace. Is that too much to ask?

8.title: The Miracle of Life
8.plot: The king pig kidnapped Red and Chuck and try to make them have a egg.

9.title: Cave Pig
9.plot: The pigs discover a perfectly preserved Cave Pig in a block of ice. Absolutely nothing bad will happen if they keep it at room temperature right?

10.title: Joy to the Pigs
10.plot: He knows when you are sleeping. He knows when you're awake. He knows if you've been bad or good - so be good for goodness sake.

11.title: Dogzilla
11.plot: Pig City is being attacked by a fearsome hairy beast. Sound the alarm. Secure the perimeter. Get the toilet paper. You know we need it.

12.title: Boulder Bro
12.plot: The other birds grow tired of Chuck's attention-seeking. That's ok. Chuck will just make a new friend.

13.title: Chuckmania
13.plot: Moustache pig puts together an egg-napping plan. Let's distract the most charismatic bird on Piggy Island by stroking his ego.

14.title: Not Without My Helmet
14.plot: Some of us wear many hats every day. For Corporal Pig, it's just the one. Hog of war. Destroyer of birds. But what what's left when you strip away his defining accessory?

15.title: Mona Litha
15.plot: One of Chuck's friends sets him up on a hot date. The table's set, and the candles are lit for a romantic evening.

16.title: Sir Bomb of Hamelot
16.plot: Bomb joins in the Medieval Fair festivities in Pig City by entering the joust competition. But is the prize really worth fighting for?

17.title: Bearded Ambition
17.plot: King Pig envies the noble bearded visages of the piggy elders, but narry a single whisker sprouts from his baby smooth face. What's a pig to do?

18.title: Cold Justice
18.plot: Matilda has a guilty pleasure: pig hockey. She's such a superfan, she even dreams of joining the game herself. There's just one problem - she's not a pig.

19.title: Slow the Chuck Down!
19.plot: Matilda thinks Chuck should slow down and enjoy the finer things in life. Then again, blazing speed does come in handy from time to time.

20.title: Brutal vs. Brutal
20.plot: A misunderstanding over some misplaced nunchucks leads to a grudge match between Chuck and the toughest pig on Piggy Island. Let's get ready to rumble.

21.title: Eating Out
21.plot: While Matilda's out at the beach, the birds are left to fend for themselves for dinner, but their culinary muscles are - not as developed as they could be.

22.title: The Great Eggscape
22.plot: King Pig finally gets an honest to gonest egg within chomping range when Red shows up and threatens to shatter his omelette-eating dreams. Time to skedaddle.

23.title: Sleep Like a Hog
23.plot: King Pig can't sleep, and it's up to Professor Pig to get him to saw some logs. He's got science on his side. But if that doesn't work, they can always put him down 'maunually'.

24.title: Pig Possessed
24.plot: King Pig is on a wild eating spree when he happens upon (i.e. devours entirely) the tent of a witch doctor.

25.title: Bombina
25.plot: Being a highly explosive bird, Bomb is a huge threat to the pigs. Maybe they can lead him away from the eggs by his heartstrings.

26.title: Epic Sax-Off
26.plot: Matilda finds a spot to practice her saxophone away from the complaints of the other birds, but she's soon upstaged by a slick piggy horn player. There's only one way to settle this - Battle of the Saxes.

1.title: Royal Heist
1.plot: King Pig rescues a mistreated egg. After all, these things aren't exactly a dime-a-dozen. Are they?

2.title: Bad Hair Day
2.plot: Chuck finds a gray feather in his plumage and is forced to cope with the fact that he is no longer a spring chicken.

3.title: Golditrotters
3.plot: This little pig is too tough for a dumb children's book. Golditrotters? Pshhhhhh - that's not scary.

4.title: A Fistful of Cabbage
4.plot: Look out pigs. There's a new sheriff in town, and he is taking absolutely no guff from these swine.

5.title: Porcula
5.plot: On one night every year, the dreaded Porcula comes out to feast, but he should really pay more attention to what he eats.

6.title: Didgeridork
6.plot: In this world, there are didgeridoos and didgeridon'ts - a lesson that Chuck had to learn the hard way.

7.title: The Porktrait
7.plot: Admiring the portraits of past leaders, King Pig tries to take the perfect snapshot to inspire admiration in all pig kind. Tries.

8.title: Fix It
8.plot: When it comes to breaking things, Chuck is a superstar. When it comes to fixing them, results vary.

9.title: Age Rage
9.plot: Professor Pig completely fails at making a youth serum, but every failure is a new opportunity - to weaponize.

10.title: Catching the Blues
10.plot: Mustache Pig seizes the perfect opportunity to catch that one blue bird. There's no escaping now.

11.title: Last Tree Standing
11.plot: Oh, Christmas tree. OH. THE CHRISTMAS TREE!!.

12.title: Happy Hippy
12.plot: When the pigs are constantly ruffling Red's feathers, it takes a special kind of bird to calm his inner beast.

13.title: Mind the Pony
13.plot: Chuck and Bomb go for a rescue mission in the heart of pig city, but when the dust settles who is left to clean up?

14.title: Robo-Tilda
14.plot: Can the pigs get away with secretly replacing Matilda with a robot look-alike? Surely not - for very long.

15.title: King of the Ring
15.plot: King Pig thinks he can go head to head with Piggy Island's most renowned wrestler. Will he hold his own, or will he get thrown around like a rag doll?

16.title: Spaced Out
16.plot: The truth is out there. Unfortunately for Chuck, so are The Blues.

17.title: Battling Butlers
17.plot: Being a good butler requires refined taste and an impeccable sense of etiquette. And then there is King Pig's butler.

18.title: Eggshaustion
18.plot: Chuck will not rest until every single egg is safe. Every last one of them.

19.title: Short and Special
19.plot: The taller pigs get to have all the fun. Unfortunately, this little piggy has none.

20.title: Hocus Porcus
20.plot: This piggy magician can make cakes vanish into thin air. Who would do such a thing?

21.title: Romance in a Bottle
21.plot: King Pig trades gifts with a secret admirer, but when sending a message in a bottle, you never know who is going to get it. Get it?

22.title: The Butler Did It!
22.plot: Movie night is ruined by a destroyed film, but King Pig must know how the movie ends. This is where it all gets a bit too real.

23.title: Stalker
23.plot: King Pig is a master mess maker, but he just might have messed with the wrong piggy.

24.title: Photochucked
24.plot: Everyone knows Bomb the bird, but when it comes to photobombs, another member of the flock steals the spotlight. Hint: He's really fast, full of himself, and yellow - rhymes with pluck.

25.title: Bake On!
25.plot: A student pig stumbles upon a cake recipe that drives King Pig wild. Does Piggy Island have a new chef pig?

26.title: Toy Hoggers
26.plot: When King Pig discards his damaged teddy bear, he instantly regrets it. He must have it back at all cost.

-1.title: Bombina
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Angry Birds Toons
plot: Red, Chuck, Bomb, Matilda, Terence, and The Blues need to keep the eggs safe from the pigs that will snatch them at any cost.
synopsis: ANGRY BIRDS TOONS brings to life the characters and adventures from one of the beloved games in history!
